title: Bram Delfos Founder of N3
description: As an Engineer and founder of a data analytics startup, I’ve spent the last 2 years researching the potential future of my industry to be ahead of everyone else. I’ve been actively iterating my vision for the future of marketing (token driven community building) and data ownership (cryptography and self-sovereign identity), and it didn’t come as a surprise that BigTech was doing the same. They are positioning themselves for the next phase of the internet; the Metaverse. If we leave it up to BigTech we end up with a WEB2 Metaverse; a digital plutocratic dictatorship. The NewNetNinja DAO envisions a WEB3 Metaverse where users are the democratic owners of the digital world. The N3 DAO will help companies, governments and individuals navigate the Wild West of WEB3, and find their footing in a democratic Metaverse. We assist in the token engineering process of WEB3 platforms, investigate and invest in 100X world changing projects and discover the WEB3 Metaverse.
downloadButton: Get a N3-NFT and become DAO member

title: To attain an edge in the vast field of WEB3, it is important to specialize.
description: By focusing on the most advanced platforms, projects, and topics in the space we can provide real value to our audience. We focus on long term potential not on short term gains.

subtitle: HIGHLIGHTS
title: NNN Highlights
description: In other words, the best marketing decision you can make is to have a product or business that fulfills a real and compelling need for a real and defined group of people — no matter how much tweaking and refining this takes.(c)

title: My Skills in Years
description: When the past gets its teeth into our daily life, it may get to grips with an astringent reality and adjust our timeline. By recognizing ourselves in the light of our history, we become aware of what we are.(c)

title: Bram Delfos
subtitle: Founder NNN
description: The longer I’m in crypto the more I realize that this movement is in fact a reinvention of democracy. It’s not just about money or a better Internet, it’s about effective decentralized collaboration. Our learnings will form the foundation of a society that can compete with China
